title: River Mobility on expansion mode; aims to open 100 stores by March 2026
description: River Mobility Pvt Ltd, supported by investors Yamaha Motor Corp and Mitsui & Company Ltd, planned to establish 100 showrooms by March 2026. They recently opened their first store in Chennai and aimed to expand with 15 more stores by November and 50 by March 2025. The 'Indie' scooters have been on sale since October 2023.
